title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) for the update to complete. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is busy performing this task.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) for the update to complete. A busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is busy performing this task.
SR: Add a busy cursor to the Export Zip feature to indicate that the system is busy updating the checked state of the table.
